block.p: American League BOSTON RED SOX--Optioned RHP Paxton Crawford to Pawtucket of the International League. NEW YORK YANKEES--Purchased the contract of RHP Dwight Gooden from Tampa of the Florida State League. Optioned RHP Ben Ford to Columbus of the International League. TEXAS RANGERS--Outrighted RHP Scott Randall and OF Scott Podsednik from the 40-man roster.

American League BOSTON RED SOX--Optioned RHP Paxton Crawford to Pawtucket of the International League. NEW YORK YANKEES--Purchased the contract of RHP Dwight Gooden from Tampa of the Florida State League. Optioned RHP Ben Ford to Columbus of the International League. TEXAS RANGERS--Outrighted RHP Scott Randall and OF Scott Podsednik from the 40-man roster.
National League SAN DIEGO PADRES--Recalled C Ben Davis from Las Vegas of the Pacific Coast League.
New York-Penn League NEW JERSEY CARDINALS--Announced the St. Louis Cardinals promoted RHP Brian Schukltz to Peoria of the Midwest League.
MILWAUKEE BUCKS--Signed C Joel Przybilla to a three-year contract and G Jason Hart to a two-year contract.
National Football League NFL--Announced the retirement of Jerry Seeman, director of officials, effective after the 2000 season.
Major League Soccer MIAMI FUSION--Traded F Eric Wynalda to New England for D-M Ivan McKinley.
ST. MARY'S, MD.--Announced they will not renew the contract of Coatlen Othell Wilson, men's basketball coach. Named Alfred L. Johnson men's basketball coach.
